## BlockDragger.endDrag() method

Finish a block drag and put the block back on the workspace.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
endDrag(e: PointerEvent, currentDragDeltaXY: Coordinate): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  e | PointerEvent | The pointerup event. |
|  currentDragDeltaXY | [Coordinate](./blockly.utils_namespace.coordinate_class.md) | How far the pointer has moved from the position at the start of the drag, in pixel units. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
